article:
'Biotechnology industrial park' ('BIP'), also called 'Bio-industrial park', 'Eco-
industrial Clusters', bioincubators) is a special form of industrial park that
specialized in biotechnology.

For example, biotechnology industrial parks in Tamil Nadu, India, include the
Biotechnology Incubator Park near Chennai, the Women's Biotechnology
Park Kelambakkam, the Medicinal Plants Biotechnology Park,
Madurai, Indian firms embrace biotechnology
[http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/south_asia/1264569.stm BBC News] Retrieved on
1 January 2008 the Marine Biotechnology Park, Madapam and a projected
Bioinformatics and Genomics Centre (BGC) at the Tidel Park in
Chennai.
